text: Jens Peder Bergensten (born 18 May 1979), also known as Jeb, is a Swedish video game programmer and designer. He is the lead designer of Minecraft. In 2013, he and Markus Persson were named in Time list of the 100 most influential people in the world. He was the co-developer in 2010. In 2011, he became the lead designer; and in 2014 got full control when Persson left the company. == Games developed == * Harvest: Massive Encounter (2008) * Minecraft (2011) * Cobalt (2016) == References == == Other websites == * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Video game designers Category:Swedish designers Category:People from Ã–rebro Category:21st-century designers
title: Jens Bergensten
